original_text: A dispute also arose among them, as to which of them was to be regarded as the greatest.
korean_text: 또 그들 사이에 그 중 누가 크냐 하는 다툼이 난지라

sentences.original_text: A dispute also arose among them
as to which of them was to be regarded as the greatest
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 가장 큰 자로 여김을 받을까 하여
